Emerald Magistrate [Melee].name: Emerald Magistrate [Melee]
description: Emerald Magistrates are agents of the Emperor’s Law, warrior-sages who dispense wisdom and justice.

finalAbility.name: Voice of Authority
description: Once per game session when making a Scheme or Support action check using a Social skill, you may choose additional targets equal to your Glory rank. You cannot choose any additional target with vigilance higher than the highest among your initial targets.
